item.title: What is IV Crush?
item.description: IV crush is a phenomenon that occurs when implied volatility (IV) drops significantly after an event or earnings announcement. This can cause option prices to decline, even if the underlying stock price remains unchanged. Why Does IV Crush Happen? IV is a measure of the expected volatility of a security over a period of time.

item.title: Our Shift to Smaller, More Focused Products
